4 bed flat for sale

4 bed flat for sale

£875,000 (£397/sq. ft)

38 St. Pauls Square, Birmingham B3

4 3 1 2,205 sq. ft*

Property features

  • 4 bedrooms
  • 3 bathrooms
  • 2 secure parking spaces
  • New build
  • Gas central heating
  • 2205 sqft
  • Views of St Paul's Square
  • Jewellery Quarter location
  • 0.4 miles from Snow Hill station
  • 999 years remaining on the lease

Property description

Register your interest now! FleetMilne Property are excited to present this brand new converted 4 bed duplex apartment in the desirable St Paul's Square. The apartment is spread over two floors has been finished to the highest standard. The apartment comprises of a large open plan kitchen/living area and guest W/C on the ground floor and 4 spacious bedrooms, with the master and 2nd bedroom having their own en-suite and bedrooms 3 and 4 having an interconnecting, dual access en-suite with shower over bath. The apartment also benefits from 2 allocated parking spaces behind secure gates as well as superb views directly on to St Paul's Square.

35- 38 St Paul's Square is located in the heart of the Jewellery Quarter and has recently been converted in to 6 brand new apartments and one townhouse within this stunning listed building. The development is in prime location for all of the amenities that the city has to offer with transport links such as Snow Hill station being 0.4 miles walk away and 0.9 miles from the Mailbox with plenty of bars and restaurants to be found in between.

The apartments are currently still under development and are likely to be completed by the third quarter of the year. The show home is launching soon so call us to register your interest!

Please note the images shown are CGI illustrations and may not represent the exact apartment.

Council Tax

Local authority

Birmingham

Estimated tax band H Council tax cost £264 /mo
when paid over 10 months
Council tax costs explained

The Council Tax cost displayed is based on the council tax band and on the basis of 2 adults living at the property. The monthly cost shown excludes any discounts and is rounded to the nearest pound.

Full information on Council Tax discount entitlements can be found on the Gov.UKs website.

Water Supply £23 Sewerage £17 Estimated water cost £40 /mo
Water costs explained

Water consumption is based on average water usage for the predicted occupancy of the property based on the number of bedrooms.

Total annual consumption (in cubic meters) is then averaged into a monthly cost.

Note: If you have 2 separate suppliers for water and sewage, you may receive 2 separate bills.
